Text: I have never once, not in over a dozen tries, ever managed to SEE an image from imagecurl. So I  don't try. And I certainly don't download anything using it.

Zahirblue: I've never had any problems with imagecurl. It doesn't give me any popups or trojan warnings like most hosting sites either.
Maybe you didnt spot the big red text saying "Click here to display image" ?

Yep, took a while to figure out they had changed the way they display images.  I thought it was a javascript thing that my browser was blocking, but you really do need to click the box to see the full-size image.
